senses.sense_definition: Relating to the enjoyment of expensive, delicate, and refined food; characterized by a preference for the best or most luxurious cuisine.

examples.text: The guests were treated to an <w>Apician</w> feast featuring rare delicacies from across the empire.
His <w>Apician</w> tastes made it difficult for him to enjoy a simple, rustic meal.

senses.sense_definition: Of or relating to the Roman gourmet Marcus Gavius Apicius, known for his love of luxury and food.

examples.text: Historians analyze <w>Apician</w> recipes to understand the complexity of ancient Roman cooking.
The manuscript contains several <w>Apician</w> techniques for preserving meat and fish.
